description: This file defines hooks and a tool function for fetching top Hacker News stories, utilizing the 'Agent' and 'FunctionCall' classes from the 'agno' package, and making HTTP requests to Hacker News API.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks with a context and tools.

classes.name: FunctionCall
classes.description: Represents a function call with associated data such as function name, arguments, and result.

methods.name: pre_hook
methods.description: A hook function executed before the main tool function, printing details of the function call.

methods.name: post_hook
methods.description: A hook function executed after the main tool function, printing details of the function call.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: A tool function that fetches and yields top Hacker News stories as JSON strings, with optional number of stories controlled by agent context.
